pages.text: 51|52|isee prakaar nahin aaya unake paas jo in (makka vaasiyon) se poorv rahe koee rasool, parantu unhonne kaha ki jaadoogar ya paagal hai.
51|53|kya ve ek-doosare ko vasiyyat[1] kar chuke hain isakee? balki ve ullanghanakaaree log hain.
51|54|to aap mukh pher len unase. aapakee koee ninda nahin hai.
51|55|aur aap shiksha dete rahen. isalie ki shiksha laabhaprad hai imaan vaalon ke lie.
51|56|aur nahin utpann kiya hai mainne jinn tatha manushy ko, parantu taaki meree hee ibaadat karen.
51|57|main nahin chaahata hoon unase koee jeevika aur na chaahata hoon ki ve mujhe khilaayen.
51|58|avashy allaah hee jeevika daata, shaktishaalee, balavaan hai.
51|59|to in atyaachaariyon ke paap hain inake saathiyon ke paapon ke samaan, atah utaavale na banen.
51|60|antatah, vinaash hai kaafiron ke lie unake us din[1] se, jisase he daraaye ja rahe hain.
52|1|shapath hai toor[1] (parvat) kee
52|2|aur likhee huee pustak[1] kee
52|3|jo jhillee ke khule pannon mein likhee huee hai.
52|4|tatha baitul maamoor (aabaad[1] ghar) kee
52|5|tatha oonchee chhat (aakaash) kee
52|6|aur bhadakaaye hue saagar[1] kee
52|7|vastutah, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana hokar rahegee.
52|8|nahin hai use koee rokane vaala.
52|9|jis din aakaash dagamagaayega.
52|10|tatha parvat chalenge.
52|11|to vinaash hai us din, jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
52|12|jo vivaad mein khel rahe hain.
52|13|jis din ve dhakka diye jaayenge narak kee agni kee or.
52|14|(unase kaha jaayegaah) yahee vah narak hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the.
